title: Less of a Debate and More of a Brawl, Zaino Says
itunes:title: Less of a Debate and More of a Brawl, Zaino Says
description:
We set the Businessweek Agenda with Bloomberg News International Economics and Policy Correspondent Michael McKee. Iona College Professor and Bloomberg News Political Contributor Jeanne Zaino provides a recap of last night's Presidential debate. We get Businessweek Economics with Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Conor Sen. He shares his view on why New York is in a depression and Texas isn't. And we Drive to the Close with George Young, Portfolio Manager at Villere Funds.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
